content: Head up the slope to see Pingping speak to her father. The Bull King isn't best pleased with The Destined One, but also has an issue with Pingping and her deception. It turns out that Pingping is actually the Red Boy, and he will transform before your eyes, ready for a battle.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md", within the section "Field of Fire Walkthrough" and the sub-section "Fallen Furnace Crater". The content is presented below:

Head up the slope to see Pingping speak to her father. The Bull King isn't best pleased with The Destined One, but also has an issue with Pingping and her deception. It turns out that Pingping is actually the Red Boy, and he will transform before your eyes, ready for a battle.
